mapper.select: SELECT USER_UID , PASSWORD , NAME , BIRTH , GENDER , PHONE , AUTHORITY , POST , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL AS ADDRESSDETAIL FROM USER WHERE USER_UID = #{USER_UID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_UID = #{CHECKID}
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NUMBER, A.*, B.* FROM REVIEW A LEFT OUTER JOIN WINE B ON A.WINE_UID = B.WINE_UID WHERE USER_UID = #{USER_UID} AND (@ROWNUM:=0) =0
SELECT COUNT(*) AS REVIEWCOUNT FROM REVIEW WHERE USER_UID = #{USER_UID}
SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NUMBER, A.*, B.* FROM QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN WINE B ON A.QNA_UID = B.WINE_UID WHERE USER_UID = #{USER_UID} AND (@ROWNUM:=0) =0
SELECT * FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN USER ON REVIEW.USER_UID = USER.USER_UID WHERE REVIEW_UID = #{REVIEW_UID}
SELECT * FROM QNA INNER JOIN USER ON QNA.USER_UID = USER.USER_UID WHERE QNA_UID = #{QNA_UID}
